name: pt.md-gnome-extension
description: Gnome Shell Extension: Manage your packages handled by Moldovan PostTerminal (pt.md)

scripts.install: npm run move && npm run enable
scripts.reinstall: npm run uninstall && npm run install
scripts.reload: gnome-shell-extension-tool -r MyPackBox@alexanderc || echo 'Unable to reload, skipping...'
scripts.build: npm run compile && zip -r dist/MyPackBox@alexanderc.zip MyPackBox@alexanderc/ --exclude=MyPackBox@alexanderc/schemas/org.gnome.shell.extensions.mypackbox.gschema.xml

author: AlexanderC <alexander.moldova@gmail.com>
